ResearchProjectDef.label: smokeleaf cultivation
ResearchProjectDef.description: The process of seperating the parts of the smokeleaf plant. Produces smokeleaf buds, seeds and hemp fibers. Allows joints to be rolled.

ResearchProjectDef.label: smokeleaf processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: The cooks have been experimenting...with some rather interesting results. Edibles are now possible. It has also been noticed that the fibers of the smokeleaf plant might be able to be used to make a some new materials, if we had the proper tools to use.

ResearchProjectDef.label: industrial smokeleaf cultivation
ResearchProjectDef.description: The cultivation table is developed, letting workers process smokeleaf in larger quantities and in new forms. A storage facility is made for easier access to trimming tools. And a new grow lamp is also invented that is a little easier on the electricity bill.

ResearchProjectDef.label: industrial smokeleaf processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: A new fuel is created from the fibers and seeds of smokeleaf. The cooks have also learned a few new recipes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced smokeleaf cultivation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Our engineers have developed new machinery to aid in the growth and processing of smokeleaf. We also learned of a new way to smoke.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced smokeleaf processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: New methods have been developed for extracting and concentraing the compounds of smokeleaf. Because of this, new edibles and recreational forms are available.

ResearchProjectDef.label: smokeleaf pharmacology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researchers isolate the beneficial compounds of Smokeleaf and are able to apply them in modern medical methods with no ill side effects.

ResearchProjectDef.label: smokeleaf glittertech
ResearchProjectDef.description: Highly advanced uses for smokeleaf byproducts are developed after in-depth study by our researchers.
